mapper.select: SELECT member.num, member.name, member.rank, rank.rankname FROM member JOIN dept ON member.dept = dept.deptno JOIN rank ON member.rank = rank.rankno WHERE member.dept = #{dept} ORDER BY member.rank ASC

SELECT member.name, member.rank, member.dept, rank.rankname, dept.deptname FROM member JOIN dept ON member.dept = dept.deptno JOIN rank ON member.rank = rank.rankno WHERE member.dept = #{dept} AND member.rank = #{rank} AND member.name = #{name} ORDER BY member.rank ASC
SELECT member.name, rank.rankname, dept.deptname FROM member JOIN dept ON member.dept = dept.deptno JOIN rank ON member.rank = rank.rankno WHERE member.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sign(title,content,writer,id,sign) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{id},#{sign})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT num FROM sign WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT sign.*, signPath.sign FROM sign JOIN signPath ON sign.num = signPath.num WHERE signPath.signName = #{signName} AND signPath.signDept = #{signDept} AND signPath.signRank = #{signRank} AND signPath.sign = "0"
SELECT signName,signDept,signRank,sign FROM signPath WHERE num = #{num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM signPath WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE sign SET signCheck = "1" WHERE num = #{num}
